# FuelCast - Live Fuel Moisture System Research Directory

## Overview
FuelCast is a predictive system developed by San Diego Gas & Electric in collaboration with Technosylva, focusing on live fuel moisture content, remote sensing, predictive modeling, and operational forecasting in the context of wildfire management. This model plays a crucial role in assessing wildfire risk by providing real-time data on live fuel moisture levels, aiding in the prediction and mitigation of fire behavior. Understanding live fuel moisture is essential in determining the flammability of vegetation, thereby enabling more effective fire management strategies.

## Key Features and Capabilities
- Real-time monitoring of live fuel moisture content.
- Integration of remote sensing data for enhanced accuracy.
- Predictive modeling capabilities for operational forecasting.
- Customizable alerts and notifications based on user-defined thresholds.
- User-friendly interface for easy interpretation and decision-making.

## Technical Specifications
- Model type: Predictive system
- Approach: Incorporates live fuel moisture data and remote sensing information for forecasting.
